Package org.example.service

Interface AccountService<T extends Employee>

Type Parameters:
T - The type, that is either an Employee or its child, for which the service is used.
All Superinterfaces:
EmployeeService<T>
All Known Subinterfaces:
EngineerService, HODService, UserService
All Known Implementing Classes:
EngineerServiceImpl, HODServiceImpl, UserServiceImpl
public interface AccountService<T extends Employee> extends EmployeeService<T>

Class AccountService

This interface is used to declare the methods that are common between:
  • HODService
  • EngineerService
  • UserService

  • Method Details

    • getAccountDetails

      Account getAccountDetails(String email, String password) throws NotFoundException, AuthenticationException, AuthorizationException
      Gets the details of the account with the associated employee. The FetchType.LAZY fields in the children of employee don't get set to null as it's the responsibility of the implementing class.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      password - The password of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      Returns:
      The details of the Account.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - If the account does not exist.
      AuthenticationException - If the user is not authenticated.
      AuthorizationException - If the user is not authorized to do the task.

    • createAccount

      void createAccount(String email, String forename, String surname, List<Address> addresses, List<Phone> phones, String password) throws AuthorizationException, AlreadyExistException
      Creates a new account.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      forename - The forename of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      surname - The surname of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      addresses - The addresses of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null or empty.
      phones - The phones of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null or empty.
      password - The password of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      Throws:
      AuthorizationException - If the user is not authorized to do the task.
      AlreadyExistException - If the account already exists.

    • updatePassword

      void updatePassword(String email, String currentPassword, String newPassword) throws AuthorizationException, AuthenticationException, NotFoundException
      Changes the password of the account. User has to be authorized and authenticated to change the password.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      currentPassword - The current password of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      newPassword - The new password of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      Throws:
      AuthorizationException - If the user is not authorized to do the task.
      AuthenticationException - If the user is not authenticated.
      NotFoundException - If the account does not exist.

    • deleteAccount

      void deleteAccount(String email, String password) throws AuthorizationException, AuthenticationException, NotFoundException
      Deletes the account.User has to be authorized and authenticated to delete the account.
      Parameters:
      email - The email of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      password - The password of the account. Throws IllegalArgumentException if it's null.
      Throws:
      AuthorizationException - If the user is not authorized to do the task.
      AuthenticationException - If the user is not authenticated.
      NotFoundException - If the account does not exist.
